::Grimmler/Ramulus::

Grimmler lands behind the gathered Destrons and Predacons, looking 
around. "What's going on here?"

Ramulus steps forward. "Yes, I'm not sure if I completely understand 
either," he says, "Are you proposing a peace between the Maximals and 
the Predacons?"

He had seen too many so-called "peace agreements", and not one had 
become permenent. Every time the Maximals made peace with the Preds 
in the past, the Preds backstabbed them. Now that Ramulus thought 
back on it, he realized that the Alliance was the only faction he 
remembered breaking a treaty peacefully, the Predacons marked 
betrayal with a full-fledged attack.
